text:
Thief Accusation

A tense room filled with accusations.  
Sonia stands frozen, face pale.  
Amalia: “Thief! Out of my lodging!”  
Audience gasps, eyes wide.  
Raskolnikov: *Glances at Sonia, then Luzhin.*  

---  

Sonia’s cheeks flush; she cries out.  
Sonia: “No, it wasn’t I! I didn’t take it!”  
Katerina: “Sonia! I don’t believe it!”  

---  

Katerina embraces Sonia tightly.  
Katerina: “You don’t know her heart!”  
Katerina: “She’d sell her last rag!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Sonia is unjustly accused of theft, prompting Katerina Ivanovna to passionately defend her character and plead for compassion from those around them.
